text:
e="preserve">Supreme Leader Snoke is a fictional character in the "Star Wars" franchise. He was introduced in the 2015 movie '. He is a CGI character voiced and performed by Andy Serkis.
Snoke is the leader of the First Order, an organization brought back from the fallen Galactic Empire, which wants to reclaim control of the galaxy. Powerful with The Force, he has seduced Kylo Ren to become evil and eventually led to him killing his father Han Solo.
Snoke also appeared in where he bridge the minds of Rey and Kylo Ren in order to manipulate them. Kylo Ren kills Snoke and takes his place as leader of the First Order. In it is revealed that Snoke is a clone and a puppet of the resurrected Emperor Palpatine.
